languages.text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} с эффектом "тень", он получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} до конца своего хода.

traits.locale_text: If the Assassin is elusive at the start of their turn, they gain +4 MP and +10 lethality until the end of their turn.
If the Assassin is elusive at the start of their turn, they gain +4 MP and +10 lethality until the end of their turn.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} начинает {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} с эффектом "тень", он получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}летальности{/g} до конца своего хода.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

traits.locale_text: Если ассасин начинает ход с эффектом "тень", он получает +4 ОП и +10 к летальности до конца своего хода.
Если ассасин начинает ход с эффектом "тень", он получает +4 ОП и +10 к летальности до конца своего хода.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，若刺客拥有“神出鬼没”效果，则会获得+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致命{/g}，效果持续至回合结束。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

traits.locale_text: 当刺客的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，若刺客拥有“神出鬼没”效果，则会获得+4{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与+10致命，效果持续至回合结束。

languages.text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} tiene el efecto evasivo al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}letalidad{/g} hasta el final de su turno.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

traits.locale_text: Si el asesino tiene el efecto evasivo al comienzo de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, gana +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +10 de letalidad hasta el final de su turno.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} zu Beginn seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} schwer fassbar ist, erhält er +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethalität{/g} bis zum Ende seines Zuges.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Assassine zu Beginn seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} schwer fassbar ist, erhält er +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +10 Lethalität bis zum Ende seiner Runde.

languages.text: Si l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g} est insaisissable au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}létalité{/g} jusqu'à la fin du tour.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

traits.locale_text: Si l'Assassin est insaisissable au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il gagne +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +10 points de létalité jusqu'à la fin du tour.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に潜伏状態の場合、ターン終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+4と{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}致死率{/g}+10を得る。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.

traits.locale_text: アサシンが{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に潜伏状態の場合、ターン終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+4と致死率+10を得る。
